name: DUNGEN HAT (BOSS DEMO)
description:
CONSEPT

As a wich's hat you attempt to make your way out of the dungen. The dungen is filled with mutents trying to get in your way. DISCLAMER: THIS ONLY IS THE BOSS AND WAS MADE IN 48 HOURS

CONTROLLS

Click to move on the objects you want to move to.
